H0.text: How many noble gases are there. 6 is excluded, so let's start with: 5

H1.text: How many noble gases are there. 4

H2.text: How many noble gases are there. 6 is excluded, so the next option is: 7

H3.text: How many noble gases are there. 6

A4.text: The noble gases (historically the inert gases, sometimes referred to as aerogens) are the members of group 18 of the periodic table: helium (He), neon (Ne), argon (Ar), krypton (Kr), xenon (Xe), radon (Rn) and, in some cases, oganesson (Og).
